title: Fully Renovated 5 Bedroom Villa in Bophut Hills
description:
Set on a beautifully landscaped 1,486 sqm plot with a 547 sqm built area, this property embodies tropical luxury with exquisite craftsmanship and elegant finishes. Its elevated position guarantees sweeping, uninterrupted views of Bophut Bay and the turquoise waters surrounding Koh Phangan.
??5 bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms
??Master suite featuring a bespoke walk-in shower
??Expansive open-plan living and dining pavilion
??Floor-to-ceiling ocean views and seamless indoor-outdoor flow.
??Salt-treated infinity pool
??Elevated sun deck
??Outdoor dining sala for ten guests
??Garden-level terraces with a second sun deck
??Tranquil space for yoga or relaxation.
??Contemporary kitchen fitted with high-end appliances
??Two covered/private parking areas.
??Fully furnished and move-in ready
??Land size 1486sqm
??Built area 547sqm
??Freehold tenure
